02003577.name: Gold Star Potion
02003577.description: A legendary fairy potion, containing golden star fragments. Use to increase both Attack Power and Magic ATT by 20 for two hours.  Warning: Does not stack with other potions. Effects only work in the Root Abyss.

02003580.name: Blue Star Potion
02003580.description: A legendary fairy potion, containing blue star fragments. Use to ignore 20% of monster's DEF while attacking for two hours.  Warning: Does not stack with other potions. Effects only work in the Root Abyss.

02003581.name: Red Star Potion
02003581.description: A legendary fairy potion, containing red star fragments. Use to increase damage done to bosses when attacking by 20% for two hours.  Warning: Does not stack with other potions. Effects only work in the Root Abyss.

02003583.name: Sparkling Gold Star Potion
02003583.description: A legendary fairy potion, containing sparkling gold star fragments. Use to increase both Weapon ATT and Magic ATT by 20 for two hours.  Warning: Does not stack with other potions or Star Potions of different types.

02003586.name: Sparkling Blue Star Potion
02003586.description: A legendary fairy potion, containing sparkling blue star fragments. Use to ignore 20% of monster's DEF while attacking for two hours.  Warning: Does not stack with other potions and Star Potions of different kind.

02003587.name: Sparkling Red Star Potion
02003587.description: A legendary fairy potion, containing sparkling red star fragments. Use to increase damage done to bosses when attacking by 20% for two hours.  Warning: Does not stack with other potions and Star Potions of different kind.

02003592.name: Boss Rush Boost Potion
02003592.description: Alchemy Masters and Renowned Masters can make this potion, which increases your Boss Damage by 10% for 40 minutes.   Caution Normally, only 1 potion can be used at a time, but Alchemists can use 2 if they are of different types.  However, even Alchemists cannot use 2 of the same potions at once, and Great Hero Boost Potions, Penetrating Boost Potions, and Great Blessing Potions cannot be used together.

02003593.name: Great Hero Boost Potion

02003612.name: Sm. Conc. EXP Accumulation Potion
02003612.description: A fantastical potion that can only be made by true meisters of alchemy. Increases EXP obtained by 20% for 30 minutes. Alchemists are able to stomach two at a time, but they are too strong for anyone else to drink more than one.

02001588.name: Hot Dog
02001588.description: A hot dog made fresh from the grill. Avoidability +200 and Accuracy +200 for 10 minutes.

02001589.name: Taco
02001589.description: A tasty looking taco.  Speed + 10 and Jump +10 for 30 minutes.

02001590.name: Pad Thai
02001590.description: Hot, fresh delicious Pad Thai! Attack +15 for 10 minutes.

02002015.name: Elpam Elixir
02002015.description: A rare, powerful elixir from Versal. Restores 90% HP & MP, and gives a boost of +5 Att and +40 Def for a duration of 15 minutes.

02002016.name: Thief Elixir
02002016.description: A special elixir for Thieves. Grants +1 Dexterity for 8 minutes.

02002017.name: Warrior Elixir
02002017.description: A special elixir for Warriors. Gives +12 W. Att for 8 minutes.

02002018.name: Wizard Elixir
02002018.description: A special elixir for Magicians. Gives +20 M.Att for 8 minutes.

02002019.name: Archer Elixir
02002019.description: A special elixir for Bowmen. Grants +1 Dexterity for 8 minutes.

02002027.name: Stirge Signal
02002027.description: A makeshift device that looks like it's been duct-taped together.  Can be used to distract enemies... slightly.  [Gives +5 Avoidability for 20 minutes.]

02002028.name: T-1337 Supercharger
02002028.description: A charger for an advanced model cyborg. Looks like it would give quite a shock to the system! [Gives +25 Weapon Attack, +60 Magic Attack for 20 minutes.]

02002041.name: 7-Star Dumpling
02002041.description: It prides off of its best taste among dumplings

02002052.name: Luck Perfume 1
02002052.description: A perfume with an otherworldly scent. Attack Power +16 for 30 min

02002053.name: Luck Perfume 2
02002053.description: A perfume with an otherworldly scent. Magic ATT +16, Speed +10 for 30 min

02002078.name: Soul Link Day 1 Potion

02002079.name: Soul Link Day 3 Potion
02002079.description: Potion obtained from playing one of the new classes during the Soul Link event. 1.2x EXP for 30 min.

02003048.name: Gollux Sapphire Piercing Potion
02003048.description: A legendary fairy potion containing blue star fragments. Allows your attacks to ignore 20% of Monster DEF for two hours.  Warning Does not stack with other potions. Effects only work against Gollux.

02003049.name: Gollux Ruby Dominance Potion
02003049.description: A legendary fairy potion containing red star fragments. Increases damage done to bosses by 20% for one hour.  Warning Does not stack with other potions. Effects only work against Gollux.

02003614.name: Item Drop Rate Increase Potion
02003614.description: A mysterious potion that increases Item Drop Rate by 50% for 5 minutes.

02003615.name: Item Drop Rate Increase Potion
02003615.description: A mysterious potion that increases Item Drop Rate by 200% for 5 minutes.

02012001.name: Fairy's Honey
02012001.description: This honey is a fairy favorite. DEX +10 for 5 min.

02012002.name: Ancient Tree Sap
02012002.description: Sap of a thousands-of-years-old tree.  Magic Attack +10 for 5 min.

02012003.name: Drake's Meat
02012003.description: Yummy drake meat. DEF +100 for 5 min.

02010070.name: Mushroom Candy
02010070.description: Delicious mushroom candy. Boosts Jump +3 for 3 minutes.

02012008.name: Unripe Onyx Apple
02012008.description: A mysterious and unripe Onyx Apple. When consumed, it grants the following: ATT +60, Magic Attack +70, DEF +10 for 1 minute.

02012015.name: Eel Bowl
02012015.description: A rich Zipangu eel bowl. Mr. Brawns says eel is the best for your health. It sure does make you feel stronger!

02012016.name: Pork Bowl
02012016.description: A golden brown Zipangu pork bowl. Mr. Brawns says a proper bowl should be filling. Eating this will increase your status!

02012017.name: Salmon Bowl
02012017.description: A smooth Zipangu salmon bowl. Mr. Brawns says good fish makes you sharp. This bowl will increase your critical rate!

02012018.name: Onyx Apple
02012018.description: A rare, ripe apple imbued with power. Recovers 90% HP & MP, and provides +100 W.Att, +100 M.Att, +20 Def for 10 minutes.

02010054.name: Salted Fish
02010054.description: A Svarti specialty made by dunking it in salt water and then drying it in the sun. The clean flavor and chewy texture are exquisite.

02010055.name: Shrelephant Meatball
02010055.description: Homemade meatballs made by mincing the delicate meat of the Shrelephant and shaping it into round balls. It's a Kaptafel specialty.

02010056.name: Low-Fat Skuas Yogurt
02010056.description: A health food made by fermenting the milk of the Shrelephant. Rumor has it that this is Skuas's secret to longevity.

02020022.name: White Chocolate

02020023.name: Dark Chocolate

02020024.name: Chocolate Basket
